short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces meaty words with the truth

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Language is a powerful tool. It makes up the tracks for our train of thoughts without whom we would be stuck. The bulk of these tracks was layed centuries ago and therefor may lead to places not worth visiting in our modern age. It takes a long time to lay new tracks and retire old ones, here is where we come in.
